name: VR Frontline Commando Assassin: Modern Combat
name_original: VR Frontline Commando Assassin: Modern Combat
description:
Gentleman! You have been called for the most dangerous and impossible mission in commando blackops war battlefield. Our bases have been destroyed and taken by the enemy troops. Your mission is to accept it and take back these bases from the enemy commandos in this VR Frontline Commando Assassin: Modern Combat. Unfortunately this time officer, you are on your own with no other support available as we have faced heavy losses and left no other soldiers troops to support you in this mission. Your country and countrymen are looking towards you for the success. Use your commando counter attach training and courage to get us back which is ours!
In VR Frontline Commando Assassin: Modern Combat rrepare yourself for Commando Action Warfare with blackops Assassin Instincts! You must counter enemy commando’s wave after wave who are determined on destroying you and your Team! You must protect your country in this intense and furious warfare combat. Your missions is to accept, plan and execute the missions at any cost.
VR Frontline Commando Assassin: Modern Combat is an action packed shooting war game. Encounter the enemies with advance state of the art weapons: armor, Ak-47, shotguns, sniper rifle and new destructive lethal weapons. Shoot at site! You are the brave Assassin commando from the army force. Aim to shoot the head shots of your rival, strive hard so that no ferocious terrorist can run away. With every targeted gun shots you would get in practice with your targets.
You're a Modern Army commando on a Combat mission! The military has sent to you to strike the enemies that have been pushing back our forces, and now you must counter strike to take the fight to the enemy! You're in for the best VR first person shooter experience!

Game play Features:
• Realistic VR Battlefield Environment
• Multiple advance lethal weapons
• Multiple missions on enemy territory
• Challenging Levels with Amazing VR Experience
• Amazing Smooth VR Gameplay
